definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
European Organization for Nuclear Research CERN, at Geneva
pinyin: Ou1 zhou1 He2 zi3 Zhong1 xin1

definition: European Organization for Nuclear Research CERN, at Geneva
pinyin: Ou1 zhou1 He2 zi3 Yan2 jiu1 Zhong1 xin1

sentences.english: Nucleon density Instrument can test its compactness rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 核子密度儀可快速獲得其壓實度。

sentences.english: The process continues as a chain reaction with other nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 這個過程和其他核子一起持續一系列反應。

sentences.english: The effect of the anomalous magnetic moment of the nucleon on the value of the internal conversion coefficient is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論核子的反常磁矩對於內轉換系數數值的影響。

sentences.english: The plane also carried nuclear warheads.
sentences.chinese: 這架飛機也同時攜帶核子彈頭。

sentences.english: The transversal momentum behavior of the longitudinal structure function of the nucleon is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了核子的縱向結構函數的橫動量行爲。

sentences.english: Everyone knows that nuclear weapons are horrible.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都知道核子武器是可怕的。

sentences.english: The repulsive force within the nucleus is enormous.
sentences.chinese: 核子內部的斥力是巨大的。

sentences.english: The carrier is armed with nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 那艘航空母艦配備有核子武器。

sentences.english: The anomalous nucleon moments are due to hadronic effects .
sentences.chinese: 反常核子磁矩是由強子效應引起的。

sentences.english: So, think about what we're saying here.
sentences.chinese: 我們說在離核子某個距離處。

sentences.english: Nucleon density distribution is one of the most important characters of an atomic nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 核子密度分佈是原子核的一個重要性質。

sentences.english: The nuclear fuel is uranium oxide.
sentences.chinese: 是鈾氧化物之核子燃料。

sentences.english: The loss caused by a nuclear war is incalculable.
sentences.chinese: 核子戰爭所造成的損失是無法估量的。

sentences.english: CERN, said anti-matter as a "mirror of the universe."
sentences.chinese: 歐洲核子研究中心稱，反物質就像是“宇宙的鏡子”。

sentences.english: A New Thinking of War and Peace;
sentences.chinese: 想到未來的核子戰爭，人人心驚肉跳。

sentences.english: Atomic depth charges have a nuclear warhead and a vastly increased killing radius.
sentences.chinese: 原子深水炸彈配備核子彈頭，具有極大的攻擊半徑。

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]
